AM_CPPFLAGS = -I${top_builddir} -I${top_srcdir}
this_includedir=${includedir}/${subdir} this_include_HEADERS = \ all.hpp \ compositequote.hpp \ derivedquote.hpp \ eurodollarfuturesquote.hpp \ forwardswapquote.hpp \ forwardvaluequote.hpp \ futuresconvadjustmentquote.hpp \ impliedstddevquote.hpp \ lastfixingquote.hpp \ simplequote.hpp
cpp_files = \ eurodollarfuturesquote.cpp \ forwardswapquote.cpp \ forwardvaluequote.cpp \ futuresconvadjustmentquote.cpp \ impliedstddevquote.cpp \ lastfixingquote.cpp
if UNITY_BUILD
nodist_libQuotes_la_SOURCES = unity.cpp
unity.cpp: Makefile.am echo "/* This file is automatically generated; do not edit. */" > $@ echo "/* Add the files to be included into Makefile.am instead. */" >> $@ echo >> $@ for i in $(cpp_files); do \ echo "#include \"${subdir}/$$i\"" >> $@; \ done
EXTRA_DIST = $(cpp_files)
else
libQuotes_la_SOURCES = $(cpp_files)
endif
noinst_LTLIBRARIES = libQuotes.la
all.hpp: Makefile.am echo "/* This file is automatically generated; do not edit. */" > ${srcdir}/$@ echo "/* Add the files to be included into Makefile.am instead. */" >> ${srcdir}/$@ echo >> ${srcdir}/$@ for i in $(filter-out all.hpp, $(this_include_HEADERS)); do \ echo "#include <${subdir}/$$i>" >> ${srcdir}/$@; \ done echo >> ${srcdir}/$@ subdirs='$(SUBDIRS)'; for i in $$subdirs; do \ echo "#include <${subdir}/$$i/all.hpp>" >> ${srcdir}/$@; \ done
